bibl.title: A New Epic Fragment on Achilles' Helmet?
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: C. Michael Sampson, A New Epic Fragment on Achilles' Helmet?

Edition of a small scrap containing fragmentary epic hexameters, ascribed to the cyclic Aethiopis of Arctinus or the Little Iliad on the basis of its contents, which most plausibly involve the death of Achilles (with possible echoes of that of Penthesilea). Oxyrhynchus (?), late II CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
